thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Seine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A True Gem!
thread.title_full: A True Gem! - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: K and R
title: A True Gem!
text: Wonderful little hotel 5-10 min walk to the Eiffel Tower and only meters away from a major Metro stop that gives you easy access to the major attractions in Paris. Good value for the location! The breakfast was normal for Europe as well as the room size. The staff spoke English and was super helpfull. I'd highly recommend this hotel.
